snippet: Huawei, a Chinese wireless company, is planning to introduce a new smartphone that it says is the world's thinnest and fastest of its class.
abstract: Huawei, a Chinese wireless company, is planning to introduce a new smartphone that it says is the world's thinnest and fastest of its class.
lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS - Huawei, a Chinese wireless company, on Monday introduced a smartphone that it claims to be the world's thinnest and fastest of its class.
